description:
• Grab eleven Godheads with their own game-changing abilities, such as explosions, mind-control and freeze
• Visit ten locations with their own obstacles to overcome, like the waterfalls in Japan, Italian volcanoes, and more
• Who can say no to a Penguin with a top hat, monocle & smoking pipe? Meet nine curious characters
• Challenge yourself in various game modes, like Capture the Head, King of the Head, Headhunters and Last Man Standing
• Play with your friends in two-player co-op Trials of the Gods mode and face challenges set forth by the gods
• Challenge others in sets of matches with a classification, or play customised matches in tournament mode
• Explore the “Gallery” for characters profiles, Heads, levels and concept art of the game
